name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Richard L. BERGER, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
EAGEN, J., did not participate in the consideration and decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Richard L. BERGER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
The judgment of sentence is affirmed.
EAGEN, J., did not participate in the consideration and decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Harry A. Dower, Boyd G. Hixson, Allentown, for appellant.
George J. Joseph, Dist. Atty., Dean L. Foote, Asst. Dist. Atty., Allentown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
335 A.2d 350
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Richard L. BERGER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 25, 1974.
Decided April 17, 1975.
Harry A. Dower, Boyd G. Hixson, Allentown, for appellant.
George J. Joseph, Dist. Atty., Dean L. Foote, Asst. Dist. Atty., Allentown, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
